column4: Can anyone help me with grub? I have borked my grub setup, but I can access /boot through a live CD. Basically grub appears to be installed in the mbr but I cannot recreate grub.cfg - running sudo grub-install on the drive just gives me an 'Installation finished. No error reported' message but doesn't actually set anything up
zvacet: To run that yuo'll need to chroot.
yes - the command I used was sudo grub-install --root-directory=/media/boot2 /dev/sda
